summary.span: 表示到数据源的连接是打开的。

span.span: Represents an open connection to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示与使用连接字符串或 ODBC 数据源名称创建的数据源的唯一连接 (DSN) 。An object represents a unique connection to a data source created by using a connection string or ODBC data source name (DSN). 对于客户端/服务器数据库系统，它等效于到服务器的网络连接。With a client/server database system, it is equivalent to a network connection to the server. 对象的某些方法或属性可能不可用，具体取决于本机 ODBC 驱动程序支持的功能 。Depending on the functionality supported by the native ODBC driver, some methods or properties of an object may not be available. 对象使用本机资源，如 ODBC 环境和连接句柄。The object uses native resources such as ODBC environment and connection handles. 应始终 通过在对象超出范围之前调用或 Dispose 来显式关闭所有打开的对象 **Dispose** ，或者在语句中放置连接 `Using` 。You should always explicitly close any open objects by calling or **Dispose** before the object goes out of scope, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement. 不这样做会使释放这些本机资源以进行垃圾回收。Not doing this leaves the freeing of these native resources to garbage collection. 它可能不会立即释放它们。It might not free them immediately. 这进而最终会导致底层驱动程序耗尽资源或达到最大限制。This, in turn, can eventually cause the underlying driver to run out of resources or reach a maximum limit. 这会导致间歇性故障。This has resulted in intermittent failures. 例如，你可能会遇到 `Maximum Connections` 与垃圾回收器正在等待删除的许多连接相关的错误。For example, you might experience `Maximum Connections` -related errors while many connections are waiting to be deleted by the garbage collector. 通过显式关闭连接，可以更有效地使用本机资源，从而提高可伸缩性并提高应用程序的总体性能。Explicitly closing the connections allows for a more efficient use of native resources, enhancing scalability and improving overall application performance. > [!NOTE] > 若要部署高性能应用程序，你必须经常使用连接池。To deploy high-performance applications, you frequently must use connection pooling. 但是，当你使用适用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序时，你不必启用连接池，因为提供程序会自动管理此。However, when you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the provider manages this automatically. 如果类的其中一个 `Execute` 方法 导致严重 (例如，SQL Server 严重级别为20或更高) ，则 可能会关闭。If one of the `Execute` methods of the class causes a fatal (for example, a SQL Server severity level of 20 or greater), the may close. 但是，用户可以重新打开连接并继续操作。However, the user can reopen the connection and continue. 创建对象实例的应用程序 可以通过设置声明性或命令性安全要求，要求所有直接和间接调用方具有对代码的足够权限。An application that creates an instance of the object can require all direct and indirect callers to have sufficient permission to the code by setting declarative or imperative security demands. 使用对象创建安全要求 。 creates security demands by using the object. 用户可以使用对象验证其代码是否具有足够的权限 。Users can verify that their code has sufficient permissions by using the object. 用户和管理员还可以使用代码访问安全策略工具 ( # A0) 在计算机、用户和企业级别修改安全策略。Users and administrators can also use the Code Access Security Policy Tool (Caspol.exe) to modify security policy at the computer, user, and enterprise levels. 有关更多信息，请参见 [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security)。For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security). 有关处理来自数据源的警告和信息性消息的详细信息，请参阅 [连接事件](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/connection-events)。For more information about handling warning and informational messages from the data source, see [Connection Events](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/connection-events). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 和一个 。The following example creates an and an . 打开并将设置为 属性。The is opened and set as the property. 然后，该示例调用 并关闭连接。The example then calls , and closes the connection. 为实现此目的， 传递了一个连接字符串和一个 SQL INSERT 语句的查询字符串。To accomplish this, the is passed a connection string and a query string that is an SQL INSERT statement. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection/VB/source.vb#1)]

Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcTransaction BeginTransaction() cil managed

summary.span: 在数据源中开始事务。

span.span: Starts a transaction at the data source.
An object representing the new transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要提交或回滚事务，则必须显式使用 或 方法。To commit or roll back the transaction, you must explicitly use the or methods. 若要确保 ODBC 事务管理模型的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序正确执行，请避免使用其他事务管理模型，如数据源提供的模型。To make sure that the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC transaction management model performs correctly, avoid using other transaction management models, such as those provided by the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果未指定隔离级别，隔离级别将由正在使用的驱动程序确定。If you do not specify an isolation level, the isolation level will be determined by the driver being used. 若要使用方法指定隔离级别 ，请使用采用参数的重载 `isolevel` 。To specify an isolation level with the method, use the overload that takes the `isolevel` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 和一个 。The following example creates an and an . 它还演示了如何使用 、 和 方法。It also demonstrates how to use the , , and methods. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.BeginTransaction1/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A transaction is currently active.
Parallel transactions are not supported.

span.span: The database name.

summary.span: 更改与打开的 关联的当前数据库。

span.span: Changes the current database associated with an open .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `value`参数必须包含有效的数据库名称，并且不能包含 null 值、空字符串 ( "" ) 或只包含空白字符的字符串。The `value` parameter must contain a valid database name, and cannot contain a null value, an empty string (""), or a string with only blank characters. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 并更改当前数据库。The following example creates an and changes the current database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Database/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Close() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 关闭到数据源的连接。

span.span: Closes the connection to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将回滚所有挂起的事务。The method rolls back any pending transactions. 然后，它会释放到连接池的连接，或者在禁用连接池的情况下关闭连接。It then releases the connection to the connection pool, or closes the connection if connection pooling is disabled. 如果在 处理事件时调用 ，则不 会触发任何其他事件。If is called while handling a event, no additional events are fired. 应用程序可以调用 多个时间而不生成异常。An application can call more than one time without generating an exception. > [!NOTE] > 使用用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序时，不必启用连接池，因为 ODBC 驱动程序管理器会自动管理此。When you use the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC, you do not have to enable connection pooling because the ODBC Driver Manager manages this automatically. 有关如何启用和禁用连接池的详细信息，请参阅 Microsoft 开放式数据库连接 (ODBC) 文档。For more information about how to enable and disabling connection pooling, see the Microsoft Open Database Connectivity (ODBC) documentation. > [!CAUTION] > 不要在 类的 `Dispose` 方法中对连接、DataReader 或任何其他托管对象调用或 `Finalize` 。Do not call or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在终结器中，只应释放类直接拥有的非托管资源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果类不拥有任何非托管资源，则不要在类定义中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [垃圾回收](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，将其打开，显示其部分属性，然后关闭连接。The following example creates an , opens it, displays some of its properties, and then closes the connection. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcConnection.Close/VB/source.vb#1)]

[System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Odbc.Design.OdbcConnectionStringEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于打开数据源的字符串。

span.span: Gets or sets the string used to open a data source.

value.span: 包括一些需要建立初始连接的设置（例如，数据源名称）的 ODBC 驱动程序连接字符串。

span.span: The ODBC driver connection string that includes settings, such as the data source name, needed to establish the initial connection.
The default value is an empty string ("").

value.span: 最大长度是 1024 个字符。

span.span: The maximum length is 1024 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 属性设计为尽可能匹配 ODBC 连接字符串格式。The property is designed to match ODBC connection string format as closely as possible. 仅当连接关闭时才可以设置，一旦设置了连接，就会将它原样传递到驱动程序管理器和基础驱动程序。The can be set only when the connection is closed, and as soon as it is set it is passed, unchanged, to the Driver Manager and the underlying driver. 因此，的语法 必须与驱动程序管理器和基础驱动程序支持的内容完全匹配。Therefore, the syntax for the must exactly match what the Driver Manager and underlying driver support. 您可以使用 属性连接到各种数据源。You can use the property to connect to a variety of data sources. 这包括 ODBC 数据源名称 (DSN) 。This includes an ODBC data source name (DSN). 下面的示例演示几个可能的连接字符串。The following example illustrates several possible connection strings. ``` "Driver={SQL Server};Server=(local);Trusted_Connection=Yes;Database=AdventureWorks;" "Driver={Microsoft ODBC for Oracle};Server=ORACLE8i7;Persist Security Info=False;Trusted_Connection=Yes" "Driver={Microsoft Access Driver (*.mdb)};DBQ=c:\bin\Northwind.mdb" "Driver={Microsoft Excel Driver (*.xls)};DBQ=c:\bin\book1.xls" "Driver={Microsoft Text Driver (*.txt; *.csv)};DBQ=c:\bin" "DSN=dsnname" ``` > [!NOTE] > 适用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持 `Persist Security Info` 其他 .NET Framework 数据提供程序支持的关键字。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support the `Persist Security Info` keyword that is supported by other .NET Framework data providers. 但是， 属性的行为与设置为时的行为相同 `Persist Security Info` `false` 。However, the property behaves as if `Persist Security Info` were set to `false`. 这意味着，如果已打开连接，则不能从属性中检索密码 。This means that you cannot retrieve the password from the property if the connection has been opened. 当 从已打开的对象中读取该属性时 ，将返回该连接字符串而不是密码。When the property is read from an object that has been opened, the connection string is returned minus the password. 不能更改此行为;因此，如果应用程序需要密码，请在调用前将其单独存储 。You cannot change this behavior; therefore, if the application requires the password, store it separately before calling . 字符串中指定的许多设置都具有对应的只读属性， (例如，对应于 `Server=(local)` 属性) 。Many of the settings specified in the string have corresponding read-only properties (for example, `Server=(local)`, which corresponds to the property). 这些属性在连接打开后进行更新，但在检测到错误时除外。These properties are updated after the connection is opened, except when an error is detected. 在这种情况下，不会更新任何属性。In this case, none of the properties are updated. 属性 (如 ) 只返回默认设置或在中指定的设置 。 properties (such as ) return only default settings or those settings specified in the . 在 Microsoft .NET Framework 版本1.0 中，在应用程序调用方法之前，不会对连接字符串进行验证 。In the Microsoft .NET Framework version 1.0, validation of the connection string does not occur until an application calls the method. 基础 ODBC 驱动程序负责验证连接字符串。It is the responsibility of the underlying ODBC driver to validate the connection string. 如果连接字符串包含无效或不支持的属性，则驱动程序可能会 在运行时引发。If the connection string contains invalid or unsupported properties, the driver may raise an at run time. 但是，在 .NET Framework 版本1.1 及更高版本中，只要设置了属性，就会发生对连接字符串的基本验证 。However, in the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later versions, some basic validation of the connection string occurs as soon as you set the property. 此时，数据访问接口将验证连接字符串是否满足 "关键字 = 值; ..."格式，但它不验证关键字或值是否有效。At that time, the data provider verifies that the connection string meets the "keyword=value;..." format, but it does not verify whether keywords or values are valid. 当应用程序调用方法时，基础 ODBC 驱动程序会执行剩余的验证 。The remaining verification is performed by the underlying ODBC driver when the application calls the method. ODBC 连接字符串具有以下语法：An ODBC connection string has the following syntax: ``` connection-string ::= empty-string[;] | attribute[;] | attribute; connection-string empty-string ::= attribute ::= attribute-keyword=attribute-value | DRIVER=[{]attribute-value[}] attribute-keyword ::= DSN | UID | PWD | driver-defined-attribute-keyword attribute-value ::= character-string driver-defined-attribute-keyword ::= identifier ``` 其中，其中 `character-string` 包含零个或多个字符; `identifier` 包含一个或多个字符; 不区分大小写; 可以区分大小写 `attribute-keyword` `attribute-value` ; 而 DSN 关键字的值不能仅包含空格。where `character-string` has zero or more characters; `identifier` has one or more characters; `attribute-keyword` is not case sensitive; `attribute-value` can be case sensitive; and the value of the DSN keyword does not consist only of blanks. 由于连接字符串和初始化文件语法，应避免包含字符 [] {} ( # A1，;？\* =！ @ 没有括在大括号中。Because of connection string and initialization file grammar, keywords and attribute values should be avoided that contain the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ not enclosed with braces. DSN 关键字的值不能只包含空格，并且不能包含前导空格。The value of the DSN keyword cannot consist only of blanks and should not contain leading blanks. 由于系统信息的语法，关键字和数据源名称不能包含反斜杠 (\\) 字符。Because of the grammar of the system information, keywords and data source names cannot contain the backslash (\\) character. 应用程序不必在 Driver 关键字后面的属性值前后添加大括号，除非该属性包含分号 (; ) ，在这种情况下，需要使用大括号。Applications do not have to add braces around the attribute value after the Driver keyword unless the attribute contains a semicolon (;), in which case the braces are required. 如果驱动程序接收的属性值包括大括号，驱动程序不应将其删除，而是返回的连接字符串的一部分。If the attribute value that the driver receives includes braces, the driver should not remove them but they should be part of the returned connection string. 括在大括号中的 DSN 或连接字符串值 {}) (包含任何字符 [] {} ( # A3，;？\* =！ @ 将原封不动地传递给驱动程序。A DSN or connection string value enclosed with braces ({}) that contains any of the characters []{}(),;?\*=!@ is passed intact to the driver. 但是，当你在关键字中使用这些字符时，驱动程序管理器将在你使用文件 Dsn 时返回一个错误，但会将连接字符串传递到常规连接字符串的驱动程序。However, when you use these characters in a keyword, the Driver Manager returns an error when you work with file DSNs, but passes the connection string to the driver for regular connection strings. 避免在关键字值中使用嵌入的大括号。Avoid using embedded braces in a keyword value. 连接字符串可能包含任意数量的驱动程序定义的关键字。The connection string may include any number of driver-defined keywords. 由于 DRIVER 关键字不使用系统中的信息，因此驱动程序必须定义足够的关键字，以便驱动程序只能使用连接字符串中的信息连接到数据源。Because the DRIVER keyword does not use information from the system, the driver must define enough keywords so that a driver can connect to a data source using only the information in the connection string. 驱动程序定义连接数据源所需的关键字。The driver defines which keywords are required to connect to the data source. 如果在连接字符串中重复任何关键字，则无法保证将选择哪个值。If any keywords are repeated in the connection string, there is no guarantee which value will be selected. > [!NOTE] > 如果 ODBC 驱动程序支持的连接字符串长度超过1024个字符，则可以使用数据源名称 (DSN) 超出最大长度限制。If an ODBC driver supports connection strings longer than 1024 characters, you can use a data source name (DSN) to exceed the maximum length limitation.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int ConnectionTimeout { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.ConnectionTimeout : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在尝试建立连接时终止尝试并生成错误之前所等待的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the time to wait (in seconds) while trying to establish a connection before terminating the attempt and generating an error.

value.span: 等待连接打开的时间（以秒为单位）。

span.span: The time in seconds to wait for a connection to open.
The default value is 15 seconds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与用于 SQL Server 和 OLE DB 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不同，用于 ODBC 的 .NET Framework 数据提供程序不支持将此属性设置为连接字符串值，因为它不是有效的 ODBC 连接关键字。Unlike the .NET Framework data providers for SQL Server and OLE DB, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC does not support setting this property as a connection string value, because it is not a valid ODBC connection keyword. 若要指定连接超时，请 在调用之前设置属性 。To specify a connection time-out, set the property before calling . 这等效于设置 ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT 特性。This is equivalent to setting the ODBC `SQLSetConnectAttr` SQL_ATTR_LOGIN_TIMOUT attribute.

span.span: The value set is less than 0.

span.span: The default value is an empty string ("") until the connection is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，在 连接字符串中设置属性。At first, the property is set in the connection string. 可以使用方法更新属性 。The property can be updated by using the method. 如果使用 SQL 语句或方法更改当前数据库 ，将发送一条信息性消息，然后更新属性。If you change the current database using an SQL statement or the method, an informational message is sent and then the property is updated. 检索 属性等效于调用 ODBC 函数 `SQLGetInfo` ， `Attribute` 参数设置为 SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG。Retrieving the property is equivalent to calling the ODBC function `SQLGetInfo` with the `Attribute` parameter set to SQL_ATTR_CURRENT_CATALOG. ## Examples 下面的示例创建 并更改当前数据库。The following example creates an and changes the current database. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnlistDistributedTransaction(class System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction transaction) cil managed

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ADO.NET 2.0 中的新增项支持使用 方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 由于它在实例中登记连接 ， **EnlistTransaction**利用命名空间中的可用功能 来管理分布式事务，使其更适合用于此**EnlistDistributedTransaction**目的。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction** for this purpose. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [分布式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions)。For more information, see [Distributed Transactions](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions). 如果禁用自动登记，则可以使用方法继续在现有分布式事务中登记 。You can continue to enlist in an existing distributed transaction using the method if auto-enlistment is disabled. 在现有分布式事务中登记可确保在提交或回滚事务后，还会提交或回滚数据源中的代码所做的修改。Enlisting in an existing distributed transaction makes sure that, if the transaction is committed or rolled back, modifications made by the code at the data source are also committed or rolled back. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅 [分布式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions). 如果已使用启动了事务，则返回异常 。 returns an exception if the has already started a transaction using . 但是，如果事务是从数据源启动的本地事务 (例如，通过使用对象) 显式执行 BEGIN TRANSACTION 语句 ， 回滚本地事务，并根据请求在现有分布式事务中登记。However, if the transaction is a local transaction started at the data source (for example, by explicitly executing the BEGIN TRANSACTION statement using an object), rolls back the local transaction and enlists in the existing distributed transaction as requested. 您将不会收到本地事务已回滚的通知，并且负责管理所有未使用启动的本地事务 。You will not receive notice that the local transaction was rolled back, and are responsible for managing any local transactions not started using .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void EnlistTransaction(class System.Transactions.Transaction transaction) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub EnlistTransaction (transaction As Transaction)

param.name: transaction
param.span: 对用于登记的现有 的引用。

span.span: A reference to an existing in which to enlist.

summary.span: 在指定的事务中登记为分布式事务。

span.span: Enlists in the specified transaction as a distributed transaction.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ADO.NET 2.0 中的新增项支持使用 方法在分布式事务中登记。New in ADO.NET 2.0 is support for using the method to enlist in a distributed transaction. 由于它在实例中登记连接 ， **EnlistTransaction**利用命名空间中的可用功能 来管理分布式事务，使其更适合使用**system.enterpriseservices.servicedcomponent ITransaction**对象的**EnlistDistributedTransaction**。Because it enlists a connection in a instance, **EnlistTransaction** takes advantage of functionality available in the namespace for managing distributed transactions, making it preferable to **EnlistDistributedTransaction**, which uses a **System.EnterpriseServices.ITransaction** object. 它还具有略微不同的语义：在事务中显式登记某个连接后，在第一个事务完成之前，不能取消登记该连接或在另一个事务中登记。It also has slightly different semantics: once a connection is explicitly enlisted on a transaction, it cannot be unenlisted or enlisted in another transaction until the first transaction finishes. 有关分布式事务的详细信息，请参阅 [分布式事务](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions)。For more information about distributed transactions, see [Distributed Transactions](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/distributed-transactions).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String) As DataTable

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

summary.span: 使用架构名称的指定名称，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified name for the schema name.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `collectionName` 为 null 时，将 包含有关所有可用元数据和任何限制的信息。When `collectionName` is null, the contains information about all available metadata and any restrictions. > [!NOTE] > 适用于此方法的所有限制 `SQLStatistics` 也适用于 `ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")` 集合。All restrictions that apply to the `SQLStatistics` method also apply to the `ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes")` collection.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[]? restrictionValues);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.DataTable GetSchema(string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetSchema (collectionName As String, restrictionValues As String()) As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchema(System::String ^ collectionName, cli::array <System::String ^> ^ restrictionValues);
public override System.Data.DataTable GetSchema (string collectionName, string[] restrictionValues);

param.name: collectionName
param.span: 指定要返回的架构的名称。

span.span: Specifies the name of the schema to return.

param.name: restrictionValues
param.span: 为请求的架构指定一组限制值。

span.span: Specifies a set of restriction values for the requested schema.

summary.span: 通过使用指定字符串作为架构名称，指定字符串数组作为限制值，返回此 的数据源的架构信息。

span.span: Returns schema information for the data source of this using the specified string for the schema name and the specified string array for the restriction values.
A that contains schema information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 `collectionName` 指定为 null 时，将 包含有关所有可用元数据及其限制的信息。When `collectionName` is specified as null, the contains information about all the metadata that is available, and its restrictions. `restrictionValues`参数可以提供*n*个值的深度，这些值由特定集合的限制集合指定。The `restrictionValues` parameter can supply *n* depth of values which are specified by the restrictions collection for a specific collection. 若要设置给定限制的值，而不设置其他限制的值，则必须将前面的限制设置为 null，然后将相应的值放在中，以确定要为其指定值的限制。In order to set values on a given restriction, and not set the values of other restrictions, you must set the preceding restrictions to null and then put the appropriate value in for the restriction that you would like to specify a value for. "Tables" 集合就是这样的一个示例。An example of this is the "Tables" collection. 如果 "Tables" 集合具有三个 (数据库、所有者和表名称) 的限制，并且你只希望返回与 "Carl" 所有者关联的表，则你需要至少传入以下值： null、"Carl"。If the "Tables" collection has three restrictions (database, owner, and table name), and you want to get back only the tables associated with the owner "Carl," then you would need to pass in at least the following values: null, "Carl". 如果未传入限制值，则将默认值用于该限制。If a restriction value is not passed in, the default values are used for that restriction. 这与传入 null 的映射相同，后者不同于传入参数值的空字符串。This is the same mapping as passing in null, which is different from passing in an empty string for the parameter value. 在这种情况下，空字符串 ( "" ) 被视为指定参数的值。In that case, the empty string ("") is considered to be the value for the specified parameter. > [!NOTE] > 所有适用于 SQLStatistics 方法的限制将应用于 ODBCConnection ( "索引" ) 集合。All restrictions that apply to SQLStatistics method will apply to the ODBCConnection.GetSchema("indexes") collection.

related.span: 从数据库获取架构信息

span.span: Obtaining Schema Information from a Database

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Open() cil managed
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Open() cil managed
abstract member Open : unit -> unit override this.Open : unit -> unit

summary.span: 使用 指定的属性设置打开到数据源的连接。

span.span: Opens a connection to a data source with the property settings specified by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从连接池绘制打开的连接（如果有）。The draws an open connection from the connection pool if one is available. 否则，它将建立与数据源的新连接。Otherwise, it establishes a new connection to the data source. > [!NOTE] > 如果 超出范围，则它表示的连接不会自动关闭。If the goes out of scope, the connection it represents does not close automatically. 因此，必须通过调用 、 **Dispose**或将连接置于语句中来显式关闭连接 `Using` 。Therefore, you must explicitly close the connection by calling , **Dispose**, or by placing the connection within a `Using` statement.

exception.span: 此方法的功能在基类中不受支持，并且必须改为在派生类中实现。

span.span: The functionality of this method is unsupported in the base class and must be implemented in a derived class instead.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void ReleaseObjectPool() cil managed

summary.span: 指示当释放最后的基础连接时可以释放 ODBC 驱动程序管理器环境句柄。

span.span: Indicates that the ODBC Driver Manager environment handle can be released when the last underlying connection is released.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `ReleaseObjectPool` 可以调用来释放 ODBC 环境句柄。`ReleaseObjectPool` can be called to release the ODBC environment handle. 例如，如果不会再次使用连接对象，则可能需要调用此方法。You might want to call this method if, for example, the connection object will not be used again. 在环境中的所有连接都关闭后，就可以释放环境了。When all connections in the environment are closed, the environment can be disposed. 请注意，单独调用方法并不会实际释放环境中存在的活动连接。Note that calling the method alone does not actually release the active connections that exist in the environment. 在最终释放环境之前，必须执行以下操作：The following must occur before the environment is finally disposed: 1. 调用 以 从环境中释放对象。Call to release the object from the environment. 2. 允许每个连接对象超时。Allow each connection object to time out. 3. 调用 。Call . 4. 调用垃圾回收。Invoke garbage collection. 相反，如果您 对所有活动连接调用，并调用垃圾回收，但不调用 ，则为环境保留的资源仍可用。Conversely, if you call on all active connections, and invoke garbage collection, but do not call , the resources reserved for the environment remain available. 环境句柄发布后，新的请求会 创建新的环境。After an environment handle is released, a request for a new creates a new environment.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property ServerVersion As String
public: property System::String ^ ServerVersion { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个包含客户端所连接到的服务器的版本的字符串。

span.span: Gets a string that contains the version of the server to which the client is connected.
The version of the connected server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 基础 ODBC 驱动程序不支持，则返回空字符串 ( "" ) 。If is not supported by the underlying ODBC driver, an empty string ("") is returned. 属性采用 "*# #. # #. # # # #*" 格式，其中，前两个数字是主版本，接下来的两个数字是次版本号，最后四位数字是发布版本。The property takes the form '*##.##.####*,' where the first two digits are the major version, the next two digits are the minor version, and the last four digits are the release version. 驱动程序必须呈现此窗体中的产品版本，但也可以将产品特定版本作为字符串追加 (例如，"04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1" ) 。The driver must render the product version in this form but can also append the product-specific version as a string (for example, "04.01.0000 Rdb 4.1"). 此字符串的格式为 "*主要. 次要. 内部版本*"，其中 *主要版本号* 和 *次要版本号* 都是两位数，并且 *内部版本号* 正好为四位数字。This string takes the form '*major.minor.build*' where *major* and *minor* are exactly two digits and *build* is exactly four digits.

span.span: The connection is closed.
Connecting to Data Sources

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: virtual property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };
Public ReadOnly Property State As ConnectionState
public: property System::Data::ConnectionState State { System::Data::ConnectionState get(); };

summary.span: 获取连接的当前状态。

span.span: Gets the current state of the connection.
A bitwise combination of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许的状态更改如下：The following are allowed state changes: - 从 `Closed` 到 `Open` ，使用 方法。From `Closed` to `Open`, using the method. - 从 `Open` 到 `Closed` ，使用 或 **Dispose** 方法。From `Open` to `Closed`, using either the or **Dispose** method. > [!NOTE] > 对打开的连接调用属性会增加应用程序开销，因为每个这样的调用都会导致对基础 ODBC 驱动程序的 SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD 调用，以确定连接是否仍然有效。Calling the property on an open connection increases application overhead because each such call causes a SQL_ATTR_CONNECTION_DEAD call to the underlying ODBC driver to determine whether the connection is still valid.

span.span: Connecting to Data Sources

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
